title: Is it permissible to decorate our house in Ramadan & Eid? - Assim al hakeem
transcript: uh i've got a question on behalf of my friend which is asking is it permissible to decorate one's house during this place month of ramadan and also during eid like for example putting balloons lights etc this is a cultural thing this has nothing to do with a form of worship so being happy and putting lanterns and putting decoration in the house when ramadan comes and is doing the same in eid it's a cultural thing it's totally totally permissible and there's nothing wrong in that insha allah you
